articles.title: Strike causes chaos at Amsterdam airport as holiday begins - CNA
articles.description:
AMSTERDAM: Amsterdam's Schiphol airport urged travellers to stay away for several hours on Saturday (Apr 23) as a strike by ground personnel at the start of a school holiday caused chaos at Europe's third-busiest airport.

articles.title: Big Europe versus ‘Madame Trump’: Why the French election is bigger than Brexit - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: If the far-right’s Marine Le Pen wins on Sunday, she aims to leave NATO and ban the hijab. But voters feel Emmanuel Macron has become President for the rich.
articles.content:
She wants to leave but dare not dare say so, and thats never good he said at a rally in eastern France.

articles.title: EU regulator backs using Pfizer COVID-19 shot as booster after other vaccines - CNA
articles.description:
A European Medicines Agency (EMA) committee on Friday (Apr 22) recommended approving the use of Pfizer and BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine, Comirnaty, as a booster for adults who have previously been inoculated with other vaccines.
